data.name: Archery Range
data.description:
Produces ranged infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.

variations.name: Archery Range
variations.description:
Produces ranged infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产远程步兵单位。
每次生产一个单位或进行研究都会产生税。

data.name: Barracks
data.description:
Produces melee infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.

variations.name: Barracks
variations.description:
Produces melee infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产近战步兵单位。
每次生产一个单位或进行研究都会产生税。

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description:
Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.
Generates tax each time a technology completes.

variations.name: Blacksmith
variations.description:
Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.
Generates tax each time a technology completes.
variations.descriptionCN:
可研究强化步兵和骑兵的科技。
每次完成科技研究都会产生税。

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, Officials, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, Officials, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵和命官，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装。

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three fishing ships.
Generates Tax each time a unit or research is produced.

variations.name: Dock
variations.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three fishing ships.
Generates Tax each time a unit or research is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产海军单位。
自动修理附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳三艘渔船。
每次生产一个单位或进行研究都会产生税。
displayClassesCN: 军事和经济建筑、交易站

data.name: Enclave of the Emperor
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Enclave of the Emperor
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
variations.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

variations.name: Farm
variations.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.
variations.descriptionCN:
可采集的食物来源，利用村民即可从农田采集食物。
每块农田只能派遣一位村民耕作。

data.name: Granary
data.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Improves the Farm gather rate of nearby Villagers by +10% (stacks with other Granaries). Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

variations.name: Granary
variations.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Improves the Farm gather rate of nearby Villagers by +10% (stacks with other Granaries). Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民可将食物存放于这个建筑。使附近村民的农田采集速率 +10% (可与其他谷仓叠加)。每次存放资源都会产生税。

data.name: House
data.description: Increases your maximum Population.

variations.name: House
variations.description: Increases your maximum Population.
variations.descriptionCN: 提升您的人口上限。

data.name: Jiangnan Tower
data.description:
Acts as a tax drop-off for Imperial Officials.
Receive a free unit at the tower whenever a Barracks, Archery Range, or Stable is completed. Receive a free Villager whenever a Town Center is completed.

variations.name: Jiangnan Tower
variations.description:
Acts as a tax drop-off for Imperial Officials.
Receive a free unit at the tower whenever a Barracks, Archery Range, or Stable is completed. Receive a free Villager whenever a Town Center is completed.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为朝廷命官的税金存放使用。
兵营、靶场或马厩建成时可免费在塔楼处获得一个单位。城镇中心建成时可获得一名免费村民。

data.name: Keep
data.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

variations.name: Keep
variations.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。

data.name: Lumber Camp
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

variations.name: Lumber Camp
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Wood at this building. Houses technologies to improve Wood gathering.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.
variations.descriptionCN:
村民可将木材存放于这个建筑。可研究提升木材采集效率的科技。
每次存放资源都会产生税。

data.name: Market
data.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader. Generates tax each time a Trader is produced.

variations.name: Market
variations.description: Allows the buying and selling of resources and produces the Trader. Generates tax each time a Trader is produced.
variations.descriptionCN: 可生产商人及交易资源。每次生产商人时都会产生税。

data.name: Meditation Gardens
data.description:
Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. 
The more resources are nearby, the more resources are generated. Enemy units nearby disturb the peace and reduce resources generated.

variations.name: Meditation Gardens
variations.description:
Generates resources depending on the type of resources nearby. 
The more resources are nearby, the more resources are generated. Enemy units nearby disturb the peace and reduce resources generated.
variations.descriptionCN:
根据附近的资源类型生成资源。
附近的资源越多，生成的资源越多。附近的敌方单位会扰乱和平状态并减少生成的资源。

data.name: Mill
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

variations.name: Mill
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.
variations.descriptionCN:
村民可将食物存放于这个建筑。可研究提升食物采集效率的科技。
每次存放资源都会产生税。

data.name: Mining Camp
data.description:
Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.

variations.name: Mining Camp
variations.description:
Villagers can drop off Stone and Gold at this building. Houses technologies to improve mining.
Generates tax each time a resource is dropped off.
variations.descriptionCN:
村民可将石料和黄金存放于这个建筑。可研究提升采矿效率的科技。
每次存放资源都会产生税。

data.name: Monastery
data.description:
Produces religious units. 
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

variations.name: Monastery
variations.description:
Produces religious units. 
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产宗教单位。
每次生产一个单位或进行研究都会产生税。
在城堡时代 (第三时代)，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。

data.name: Mount Lu Academy
data.description:
Imperial Officials collect tax twice as often and also collect 20% of taxes as Food.
Contains unique upgrades that greatly improve the Imperial Official unit.

variations.name: Mount Lu Academy
variations.description:
Imperial Officials collect tax twice as often and also collect 20% of taxes as Food.
Contains unique upgrades that greatly improve the Imperial Official unit.
variations.descriptionCN:
朝廷命官可以频繁征税，还会收取 20% 的税款用于食物的开销。
包含特殊升级，可以大幅强化朝廷命官单位。

data.name: Outpost
data.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。

data.name: Pagoda
data.description: Religious units can pick up Relics and place them in the Pagoda to generate +100 Gold, +62 Food, +62 Wood, and +25 Stone every 60 seconds.

variations.name: Pagoda
variations.description: Religious units can pick up Relics and place them in the Pagoda to generate +100 Gold, +62 Food, +62 Wood, and +25 Stone every 60 seconds.
variations.descriptionCN: 宗教单位可拾取圣物，并将其放置在宝塔中，可以每 60 秒生产 +100 黄金、+62 食物、+62 木材和 +25 石料。

data.name: Palisade
data.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

variations.name: Palisade
variations.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.
variations.descriptionCN:
轻型的防御城墙，可快速为区域设防。
最初花费 21 木材，每增加一段则花费 7 木材。

data.name: Palisade Gate
data.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.

variations.name: Palisade Gate
variations.description: Light defensive gate. Must be built on a Palisade Wall segment.
variations.descriptionCN: 轻型防御城门。必须建造在木栅栏上。

data.name: Shaolin Monastery
data.description: Unique Monastery capable of producing Shaolin Monks. From the Yuan Dynasty onwards, Shaolin Monks can also be produced from Pagodas.

variations.name: Shaolin Monastery
variations.description: Unique Monastery capable of producing Shaolin Monks. From the Yuan Dynasty onwards, Shaolin Monks can also be produced from Pagodas.
variations.descriptionCN: 独特的修道院，能够生产少林僧侣。从元朝开始，宝塔也可以生产少林僧侣。

data.name: Siege Workshop
data.description:
Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.
Generates tax each time a unit is produced.

variations.name: Siege Workshop
variations.description:
Produces siege engines and powerful gunpowder units.
Generates tax each time a unit is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产攻城器械和强大的火药单位。
每次生产一个单位都会产生税。

data.name: Stable
data.description:
Produces cavalry military units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.

variations.name: Stable
variations.description:
Produces cavalry military units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产骑兵军事单位。
每次生产一个单位或进行研究都会产生税。

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.

variations.name: Stone Wall
variations.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.
variations.descriptionCN:
坚固的城墙，火把无法攻击。
城墙上的单位受到远程攻击的伤害 -25%，攻城攻击的伤害 -50%，并且它们的射程 +1。

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

variations.name: Stone Wall Gate
variations.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.
variations.descriptionCN:
重型防御城门。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用城门前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.

variations.name: Stone Wall Tower
variations.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
variations.descriptionCN:
防御坚实的箭塔，可发射扭力弩炮。必须建于石墙上。
步兵可利用箭塔前往城墙顶端。

data.name: Temple of the Sun
data.description: Activate powerful abilities that improve speed, damage, range, or regeneration of specific units.

variations.name: Temple of the Sun
variations.description: Activate powerful abilities that improve speed, damage, range, or regeneration of specific units.
variations.descriptionCN: 激活强悍的能力，可以提高特定单位的速度、伤害、射程或恢复效果。

data.name: Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, Officials, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, Officials, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵和命官，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。

data.name: University
data.description:
Houses advanced technology that benefits the civilization.
Generates tax each time a technology completes.

variations.name: University
variations.description:
Houses advanced technology that benefits the civilization.
Generates tax each time a technology completes.
variations.descriptionCN:
可研究对整个文明有益的先进科技。
每次完成科技研究都会产生税。

data.name: Village
data.description: Increases maximum Population by 40.

variations.name: Village
variations.description: Increases maximum Population by 40.
variations.descriptionCN: 人口上限提升 40。

data.name: Zhu Xi's Library
data.description:
Hosts a range of highly unique upgrades.
Can unlock Yuan Raiders and Imperial Guards. Only 2 technologies can be researched.

variations.name: Zhu Xi's Library
variations.description:
Hosts a range of highly unique upgrades.
Can unlock Yuan Raiders and Imperial Guards. Only 2 technologies can be researched.
variations.descriptionCN:
提供一系列非常独特的升级。
可解锁元朝掠夺者和皇宫卫兵。仅可研究 2 科技。
displayClassesCN: 第四时代：军事与科技地标
